title: The Best Tweets From Yesterday's Tsnownami | Dan Barreiro | KFAN FM 100.3
text:
The Best Tweets From Yesterday's Tsnownami posted by Alexander Shun - share 
With the "crazy snow totals" that were predicted yesterday, Gaardsie recruited the help of live weather watchers from across the state to send their best pictures from Tsnownami. 
The totals were crazy and some had to wade through unheralded piles of snow to get these photos, but luckily they got them and Gaardsie compiled the best of them here. @jgkfan We've got a fantastic crew clearing streets in Shakopee! We don't mind higher taxes 4 this kind of service! Even cleared driveways! pic.twitter.com/NSEgVw9UCk â€” Bill Schleper (@bschlep1) February 24, 2017 @jgkfan Think we got the entire #snownami in Austin pic.twitter.com/5r4TAOvCIP
